*Infectra smiles waves to any bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I don't thin=
k they like me. *Infectra whispers to Airbomber*
  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, July 05=
, 2000 11:47 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "Sure, we'll tell ya." Ai=
rbomber said, making sure nobody was aiming their blaster's at Infectra.

 =
 "Hey, everyone! This is Infectra! She's with us!" Airbomber said. Plintiss=
a growled.

  "These Radicons fired at me, Artist, and Dracona when we trie=
d to help them and ran away! I don't think they could be trusted!" Plintiss=
a said.

  "We have our gestalt form and we're useful and powerful." Strana=
to said. Plintissa walked away angrily...
    ----- Original Message ----- =

    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, =
July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra nods =
and follows the Radicons* Infectra: How can you tell if one is not to be tr=
usted? *Infectra says to the Radicons*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
=
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, Jul=
y 04, 2000 5:36 PM
      Subject: Neo Beast Wars


      Sinesis and Sinist=
er both kept poking each other, but saying nothing when the other looked. T=
hey both grabbed their swords and were about to stab each other, but they p=
ut the swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

      Plintissa and Draco=
na decided to follow Artist and they walked off to the Ark. Once there, the=
y entered the base.

      "Hey, have any of you seen a bot come by here ju=
st staring?" Plintissa asked. Dracona started to look around in logical pla=
ces a lunatic might hide.

      Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting aro=
und and drinking tea and they left again.

      "Who shall we join with, d=
ear?" Inzola asked.

      "Whomever wants out assistance." Deemos replies.=
 They walk on until they see the Alliance base.

      "This one looks good=
, lets go and ask them if they have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola a=
nd Deemos walked up to the base.

      "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking=
 to join your fine team, we have been looking for a faction to join, and it=
 appears that it is you who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wi=
sh to join you, what fo we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something re=
asonable, please, no killing a bot things or anything.)

      Gangon had a=
 nightmare, He was again tied to the magical chair when Sinister and Sinesi=
s came up to him. Then BrightBlade did, and then Dracona. They all pulled o=
f their masks and were 2 headed, one head Inzola, and the other head Deemos=
. Gangon screamed and held hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, and remembere=
d that he couldn't move. He considered that thing about getting a replaceme=
nt body, how it would be a good idea just in case he had to get out of this=
 dump, which was probable if he wanted to kill himself. He waited for Plint=
issa and Dracona to come back.

      The Radicons looked at Infectra.

   =
   "Now, all you need to do is follow us, we have set you on friend of the =
Maximals, I'm sure they won't mind, seeing as how you would make a great ad=
dition to their group." Airbomber said. They walked inside of the Maximal b=
ase, waiting for Infectra to follow.

      Artist walked around the war ro=
om in circles, not quite knowing where he was going.
